com.ibm.pzsdk

Class PIAPIAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.pzsdk.PIAPIAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PIAPIAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides an interface with the Presence Insights APIs. All methods return the API result as a String, unless otherwise specified. I'm looking at you getFloorMap.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
